data.title: MRT Operation Hours
data.text:
Station Opening - Kajang & Putrajaya Lines

Stations will be opened for services at 6:00 am daily except if there is approved event that need specific station (s) to be opened earlier than normal.

Station Closing

Stations closing time will be varies from each station. Once the station roller shutter has been closed, passenger shall exit the station via the âbypassâ door.

Station Closing (Monday to Saturday) - Kajang Line

Station Name Last train towards Kajang Last train towards Kwasa Damansara Station Closing Time Kwasa Damansara 11:35 pm 12:41 am 11:25 pm Kwasa Sentral 11:37 pm 12:38 am 11:25 pm Kota Damansara 11:41 pm 12:35 am 11:35 pm Surian 11:43 pm 12:32 am 11:35 pm Mutiara Damansara 11:45 pm 12:29 am 11:35 pm Bandar Utama 11:47 pm 12:27 am 11:45 pm Taman Tun Dr Ismail 11:50 pm 12:24 am 11:45 pm Phileo Damansara 11:53 pm 12:21 am 11:45 pm Pusat Bandar Damansara 11:56 pm 12:17 am 11:45 pm Semantan 11:58 pm 12:15 am 12:00 am Muzium Negara 12:03 am 12:10 am 12:00 am Pasar Seni 12:05 am 12:08 am 12:00 am Merdeka 12:07 am 12:06 am 12:00 am Bukit Bintang 12:10 am 12:03 am 12:00 am Tun Razak Exchange 12:12 am 12:01 am 12:00 am Cochrane 12:15 am 11:59 pm 12:00 am Maluri 12:16 am 11:57 pm 12:00 am Taman Pertama 12:20 am 11:54 pm 11:45 pm Taman Midah 12:22 am 11:52 pm 11:45 pm Taman Mutiara 12:24 am 11:50 pm 11:45 pm Taman Connaught 12:27 am 11:48 pm 11:45 pm Taman Suntex 12:29 am 11:45 pm 11:45 pm Sri Raya 12:32 am 11:43 pm 11:35 pm Bandar Tun Hussein Onn 12:34 am 11:41 pm 11:35 pm Batu 11 Cheras 12:36 am 11:39 pm 11:35 pm Bukit Dukung 12:39 am 11:36 pm 11:25 pm Sungai Jernih 12:43 am 11:33 pm 11:25 pm Stadium Kajang 12:44 am 11:31 pm 11:25 pm Kajang 12:47 am 11.30 pm 11:25 pm
